instruction: Create a web crawler in Python to scrape news articles from a given website. Bonus points if you can add support for pagination.
buggy_code:
import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

url = 'https://example.com'

articles = []

def scrape_articles(url):
 return
 response = requests.get(url)
 html = BeautifulSoup(response.text, 'html.parser')
 article_elements = html.find_all('article')

 for article_element in article_elements:
 title = article_element.find('h2').text
 content = article_element.find('p').text

 article = {
 'title': title,
 'content': content
 }

 articles.append(article)

scrape_articles(url)

next_page_element = html.find('a', {'title': 'Next page'})

while next_page_element:
 next_page_url = next_page_element['href']
 scrape_articles(next_page_url)
 next_page_element = html.find('a', {'title': 'Next page'})

for article in articles:
 print(article)
